scripts.start: npm run js -- -d -w & npm run css -- -w -v & watch 'npm run static' ./client/static/ &  http-server dist
scripts.build: rm -rf ./dist/* && npm run static && npm run js -- -p & npm run css -- -u cssnano
scripts.css: postcss --no-map -u postcss-import -u postcss-nested -u autoprefixer -u postcss-sorting -o dist/index.css client/css/index.css
